summary: A PyTorch embedding module that separates the main embedding matrix from extra trainable embeddings, allowing the main weights to be optionally frozen while always training a configurable number of additional embeddings; defaults to standard embedding behavior when no extra embeddings are requested.
business_intent: Enable flexible fine‑tuning of large language models by freezing most embedding parameters while still learning new task‑specific vectors, reducing computational cost and preserving pretrained knowledge.
